sentences.sContent: Well, basically, it’s a matter of filling in a few forms.
sentences.sCn: 嗯，其实也就是填几张表的事。

sentences.sContent: I used to see him every night, basically.
sentences.sCn: 基本上，我以前每天晚上都见他。

sentences.sContent: ...Americans have basically decided that they don't really want to produce all their Own oil...
...it means they're basically stuck with a four pound paperweight that they can't sell back...
...I can only remember basically what I said before...

trans.tranOther: used to emphasize the most important reason or fact about something, or a simple explanation of something
